title: Best Buy Earnings, Retail Data Ahead of Black Friday, Joy Replacing Gloom for Global Investors
itunes:title: Best Buy Earnings, Retail Data Ahead of Black Friday, Joy Replacing Gloom for Global Investors
description:
Bloomberg News U.S. Retail Reporter Matthew Boyle discusses Best Buy earnings. Michael Osborne, President & CEO of SmarterHQ, breaks down retail data ahead of Black Friday. Bloomberg News FX Reporter Katherine Greifeld talks about a hedge fund firm shorting the dollar in preparation for a potential Warren presidency. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg Businessweek Economics Editor Peter Coy share insight on recent market rally as recession risk fades. And we Drive to the Close with Hilary Kramer, President and CIO at A&G Capital.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
